channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023081921
item.description:
Report X-2023081921

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM THE TRUCK AND IT WAS NOTICED BOX WAS WET. BOX WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: CONTAINER LEAKED FROM A LOOSE CAP DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM THE TRUCK AND IT WAS NOTICED BOX WAS WET. BOX WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023081111
item.description:
Report X-2023081111

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD THE MANAGR NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND IMMEDIATELY TOOK PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. MANAGER THEN PROPERLY SECURED AND VENTILATED PACKAGE. I THEN GOT CALLED OVER TO REPACK THIS PACKAGE INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM. DescribePack: THERE WAS FOUR BOTTLES INSIDE THIS PACKAGE. TWO OUT OF THE FOUR HAD LOOSE CAPS ON THEM CAUSING THEM TO LEAK OUT ONTO THE OTHER BOTTLES AND THE BOX ITSELF MAKING THE PACKAGE WET. APPROXIMATELY 2 CUPS LEAKED OUT DUE TO THOSE LOOSE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE MANAGER TAKING IT OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE AND VENTILATE IT. I THEN REPACKED IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM SAFELY, PROPERLY AND IN A TIMELY MANNER. I AM NOW AWAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023080648
item.description:
Report X-2023080648

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-03
  • City: WAYNE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer this morning, and Package handler noticed a strong odor (paint). Once inspected it looked like it had been dropped prior upon arrival, if you take a look at the tracking, it was bouncing all around. DescribePack: at the bottom of the can you can see dents and a puncture hole that the liquid is leaking out from. DurationRel: 700 and MitigateEffect: was given QA attention and was placed inside of HAZ TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023080581
item.description:
Report X-2023080581

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS THE MANAGER NOTICED THE PKG WAS WET AND PURPLE. MANAGER IMMEDICATELY TOOK PKG OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. I SECURED AND VENTILATED PROPERLY. I THEN REPACKED IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND AM AWAITING THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 1 CUP OF STAIN LEAKED OUT DUE TO A LOOSE CAP ON ONE OF THE FOUR BOTTLES. IT LEAKED OUT ONTO THE OTHER 3 BOTTLES AS WELL CAUSING THE STAIN TO BE ALL OVER ALL FOUR BOTTLES. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY TAKEN OVER TO HAZMAT CAGE TO BE SECURED AND REPACKED INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND VENTILATED PROPERLY.

  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that one of the metal 500 pound cylinder of ethyl mercaptan (un2363) had a leaking valve due to heat and that 100 pounds had been released. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023080659
item.description:
Report X-2023080659

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: EAST BRUNSWICK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought over to the QA area for investigation due to the box being went on the bottom. A QA team member realized the ISOPROPANOL was leaking from one bottle during the investigation. The QA manager as well as P&D and the safety manager was then made aware of the damaged hazmat. DescribePack: The aluminum seal was broken and the cap was loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The cap was placed back on correctly

item.title: Report X-2023080649
item.description:
Report X-2023080649

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: DOVER
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Original HESS #100509 - orig. date entered 7/28 - incorrectly cancelled - re-entered 8/3 - Box found on van line wet/oily and smelling strongly of lemon cleaner. Box was removed from van line for inspection and placed into a red hazmat bin with plastic liner to contain potential leak. Bin/box were brought to QA cage for inspection. DescribePack: Box appears crushed in on top corner and oily/wet from leak, but is not actually punctured/torn. Outer package contains 2 inner boxes, with 12 aerosol cans placed in each. One corner of both the outer and inner boxes appears crushed inward. Outer and inner boxes appear otherwise undamaged. This was likely crush/drop damage and not caused outright by any poor or inadequate packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed from van line and placed into a red hazmat bin lined with plastic hazmat liner. Box and bin were removed to QA cage for inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023080524
item.description:
Report X-2023080524

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ETHYL ALCOHOL, U.S.P WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES SLIGHTY LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE CAP BEING LOOSE CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF ETHYL ALCOHOL, U.S.P. TO BE SLIGHTY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023080523
item.description:
Report X-2023080523

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ECOLAB GREASESTRIP PLUS WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES HALF LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE CAP BEING LOOSE CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF GREASESTRIP PLUS TO BE HALF WAY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION
